comment: bitcoin were just moved in a transaction . That's ~ $ , transfered for an $ fee . No government , bank or third party had to verify the transaction , nor could they have stopped it if they wanted to . The true power of bitcoin .
Free on EOS , so you could say you made $ if it were in EOS . And it takes only second for an EOS transaction . BTC gave us EOS , thanks BTC . Your the best
